name: test-kmz
description: Testing loading KMZ files on a LeafletJS web map.

scripts.start: npm run client:build && cd webserver && npm start
scripts.install: npm install --prefix ./client && npm install --prefix ./webserver && npm install --prefix ./webserver-kmz
scripts.lint:all: npm run lint --prefix ./client && npm run lint --prefix ./webserver && npm run lint --prefix ./webserver-kmz
scripts.lint:fix:all: npm run lint:fix --prefix ./client && npm run lint:fix --prefix ./webserver && npm run lint:fix --prefix ./webserver-kmz

author: ciatph
